Entry.Value: Added function for prosthetic arm. Upgrading this provides Snake with new skills.
Prosthetic precision movement. Upgrading this provides Snake with new skills.
Prosthetic first aid function. Upgrading this provides Snake with new skills.
A cardboard box with a desert camo pattern. Use on sand or soil to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.

Highly sensitive night-vision gear that augments sight for better situational awareness in low light. Battery is charged by kinetic energy generated by the user's natural motions, supplemented by solar power.

Prototype stealth camouflage. Renders the user optically transparent, making visual detection next to impossible. Since this is still a prototype, it can only be used in short bursts. *Restricts mission completion rank to an A or below, and cannot be used during FOB Missions.
<I=G=HUD_DECIDE>: Use

A cigar blended with a medicinal plant that speeds up the perception of time. Doesn't work if user is under stress, such as when spotted by an enemy. *Cannot be used during FOB Missions.
<I=G=HUD_DECIDE>: Use

Special medicinal plant blend that has a relaxing effect. For a limited time, suppresses hand tremors when aiming a weapon.
<I=G=HUD_DECIDE>: Use

Special medicinal plant blend that heightens awareness. For a limited time, makes user aware of nearby organisms without having marked them.
<I=G=HUD_DECIDE>: Use
Special medicinal plant blend that boosts concentration. Used to artificially induce a reflex mode effect. *Cannot be used during FOB missions. <I=G=HUD_DECIDE>: Use
Parasite supply cartridge (Mist-type). Equip to Parasite Suit to activate a special ability of the Skulls: Mist dispersal. <I=G=HUD_DECIDE>: Use

Parasite supply cartridge (Camouflage-type). Equip to Parasite Suit to activate a special ability of the Skulls: Invisibility. *Restricts mission completion rank to an A or below. <I=G=HUD_DECIDE>: Use

Parasite supply cartridge (Armor-type). Equip to Parasite Suit to activate a special ability of the Skulls: Enhanced armor.
<I=G=HUD_DECIDE>: Use
Standard combat fatigues (olive drab). Wear among greenery to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (splitter). Wear when operating vehicles or weapon emplacements to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (tiger stripe). Wear on rocky surfaces to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (gold tiger). Wear on red soil to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (desert fox). Wear on sand or soil to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (woodland). Wear among greenery to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.

Specialized infiltration suit. In addition to the noise-dampening soles that eliminate the sound of footsteps, this suit features a high-strength aramid weave that offers superb damage resistance. *In FOB missions, this uniform prevents your body heat being detected by NVG-equipped enemies. * Will be equipped by guards when SECURITY SETTINGS are set to Non-lethal.

The standard Sneaking Suit with bulletproof ceramic plates fitted/inserted throughout to act as heavy combat protective gear, greatly increasing protection for the wearer. * Will be equipped by guards when SECURITY SETTINGS are set to Lethal.

Special prototype combat suit based on the Skulls' parasite technology. Equip with cartridges containing parasites to activate the same special abilities as the Skulls. *Cannot be used during FOB Missions.
Variable-magnification binoculars for long-range recon and intel support. Equipped with a directional microphone feature, allowing the user to listen to distant noises and conversations.
Portable data device for downloading and viewing tactical information necessary for executing missions.
Device that uses a balloon to extract personnel from the battlefield. Can also be used on animals.
Added function for Fulton recovery device. Enables extraction of large cargo such as vehicles, anti-air emplacements, and containers.
Naked D-Dog. Use the "Keep 'em busy" command to have him keep an enemy busy.
Sneaking Suit for D-Dog. Equipped with a knife. Use the "Do it (kill enemy)" command to have him kill an enemy.
Sneaking Suit for D-Dog. Equipped with a stun knife. Use the "Do it (knock out enemy)" command to have him knock out an enemy.
Battledress for D-Dog. Use the "Do it (wound enemy)" command to have him critically wound an enemy.
Battledress for D-Horse. Reinforced with bulletproof ceramic plates fitted/inserted throughout.

General-purpose tactical helicopter. A prototype for a next-generation helicopter design. The quadruple engines are still in development, but the armament installed on the stub wings can be upgraded. This helicopter is uniquely equipped with a Fulton recovery arm.

Heavy-duty outboard loudspeaker. A sound broadcast device developed to raise friendly unit morale and as a form of psychological warfare against the enemy. However, its effectiveness in actual combat is as yet unclear.
Air-to-ground rocket launcher. Fires simple rockets that lack any guidance technology. The powerful HE warheads make for highly effective area suppression when fired in volleys.

Air-to-ground guided missiles. Highly accurate air-to-ground missiles that use active radar homing to track targets. Has a high operating cost due to the complicated hardware packed into each missile.

Anti-air missile countermeasure flare dispenser. A device that ignites dense bursts of metal filings to make IR-guided missiles "dummy off" on the resulting heat and miss the helicopter. Effectiveness in missile evasion depends on the number of flares and their burn time.
Lightweight appliqué armor. Add-on aircraft armor composed primarily of an aluminum alloy. Improves helicopter durability.
A high-grade cardboard box made of water-resistant material. A special item custom-made for the legendary mercenary himself.
A cardboard box with a forest camo pattern. Use among greenery to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
A cardboard box with a red soil camo pattern. Use on red soil to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
A cardboard box with an urban camo pattern. Use on metal or concrete surfaces to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
RENOV-ICKX sniper rifle customized by Quiet. Fitted with a laser sight for improved accuracy. Nicknamed "Wicked Butterfly."
Standard combat fatigues (squares). Wear on metal or concrete surfaces to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (wetwork). Wear in rivers or swamps to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.

Myoelectric prosthesis for Snake. Use the Call Button (<I=G=CALL>) + <I=G=CAMERA> to perform a "knock" (lure enemies). When equipped as a secondary weapon, press the CQC Button while sprinting to unleash a devastating punch.
Tactical vest for D-Dog. Equipped with a Fulton extraction device. Use the "Get it" command to have him Fulton extract neutralized soldiers and prisoners.
Costume for D-Dog. Now you can finally go into battle with Miller... or the next best thing.
Costume for D-Dog. Now you can finally go into battle with Ocelot... or the next best thing.
Costume for D-Horse. Jet black loadout inspired by the Man on Fire's horse, though it doesn't envelop its wearer in flames or grant any other special abilities.

Snake Custom Walker Gear. A bipedal riding machine that uses versatile walking movements to outperform tracked/wheeled vehicles on various terrain types. Fitted with a general-purpose weapon-interchange system.
Snake Custom Walker Gear. Employs rolled homogenous armor to protect, but not obstruct, the many drive parts inherent in bipedal weapons platforms. Improved chassis durability.
Snake Custom Walker Gear. Employs composite armor (layered panels of simple materials) to protect against penetrator projectiles. Improved chassis durability.
Ammo rack. Expanding this allows more ammunition to be carried for the sub weapon, extending your sustained firefight capability.
Auto-loader. Upgrading this shortens sub weapon reload time, lessening vulnerability in battle.
Support head. In addition to basic aiming functions, recognizes the user and responds to "Whistle (call)".
Support head. Adds a stealth function, lessening the chances the Gear will be spotted by the enemy during its vulnerable wait mode.
Scouting head. Fitted with a video surveillance system capable of identifying hostiles. Will automatically scout for and mark enemies.
Intercept head. Fitted with a high-spec surveillance system. Can identify, engage, and neutralize enemies under its own judgment.
General-purpose manipulator arm. Adding objective-specific programming will enable this robot arm to function in a range of mission roles.
General-purpose manipulator arm. Fitted with reinforced drive parts and additional close-quarters melee combat programming. Press the CQC Button (<I=G=ATTACK>) to perform throws and strikes.
General-purpose manipulator arm. Has a common machete mounted on the forearm. Equip with <I=G=PAD_ALL>+<I=G=CAMERA>, allowing you to perform slashing attacks.
General-purpose manipulator arm. Fitted with a repurposed Skulls machete. Its attacks are effective even against vehicles such as trucks and Walker Gears.
WU S.PISTOL customized for use by Walker Gear.
WU S.PISTOL AP customized for use by Walker Gear.
AM D114 handgun customized for use by Walker Gear.
GEIST K11 handgun customized for use by Walker Gear.
ZE'EV submachine gun customized for use by Walker Gear.
Gatling gun. Multiple barrels unleash a storm of bullets at an unparalleled rate of fire, for extraordinary stopping power. Accuracy on the move has been thoroughly proven in live fire tests.

Anti-tank guided missile. An anti-materiel missile fitted with an automatic homing system. The "Munroe/Neumann effect" of the shaped charge warhead focuses blast energy on a single point, easily penetrating even tank armor.
Flamethrower. Uses pressurized gas to eject highly adhesive flammable fuel, which is ignited at the muzzle to create a stream of flame. Has limited range, but is effective in closed spaces.
High-voltage stun gun. Device designed to neutralize enemies with a high-voltage electric shock. Has a wide effective range, and can even incapacitate enemies on the far side of walls.

Fulton extraction ballista. Specialized grenade launcher that fires a Fulton extraction device developed to fit into a grenade casing. Can also fire cargo/child-safe Fulton devices provided these have been developed separately. *Restricts mission completion rank to an A or below.
A cardboard box with a universal camo pattern. Use on sand or among greenery to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
A cardboard box with a mountain camo pattern. Use on rocky terrain to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
A cardboard box with a marsh camo pattern. Use in marsh terrain to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
An infiltration-model cardboard box that disperses a smokescreen when destroyed, aiding the user's escape. A special item custom-made for the legendary mercenary himself.

Stealth camouflage. Renders the user optically transparent, making visual detection next to impossible. Battery is charged by kinetic energy generated by the user's natural motions, supplemented by solar power. *Restricts mission completion rank to an A or below, and cannot be used during FOB Missions.

Thermal imaging infection detector. Night vision goggles modified by a researcher in the Laboratory. Detects the heat given off by vocal cord parasites within infected personnel, and highlights the heat signature for easy identification.
RENOV-ICKX sniper rifle customized by Quiet. Fires tranquilizer rounds at subsonic speeds, for improved accuracy. Nicknamed "Guilty Butterfly."
BRENNAN LRS-46 sniper rifle customized by Quiet. Uses special handloaded ammunition packed with the maximum amount of gunpowder, for severe stopping power. Nicknamed "Sinful Butterfly."
Standard combat fatigues (gray urban). Wear among steel and concrete to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (blue urban). Wear among marsh terrain to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (pixelated desert). Wear on sandy surfaces or among greenery to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (black Ocelot). Wear at nighttime to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you. Uniform worn by Ocelot's private unit.

All-weather survival & infiltration suit designed to be heat-, water-, and shock-resistant while also maintaining optimum body temperature. The noise-dampening soles eliminate the sound of footsteps. *In FOB missions, this uniform prevents your body heat being detected by NVG-equipped enemies.
A biker jacket that will keep the wearer safe and sound under even the harshest conditions. A favorite of "The Man Who Sold the World."

A costume for roleplaying as Solid Snake, replete with Sneaking Suit. Reduces footstep noise when moving, and provides increased damage resistance. *In FOB missions, this uniform prevents your body heat being detected by NVG-equipped enemies.
A costume for roleplaying as the Cyborg Ninja. Improves speed when sprinting as well as jump distance.
A costume for roleplaying as Raiden, replete with custom cyborg body. Significantly increases sprinting speed and jump distance.
"Her" bandana, salvaged from Lake Nicaragua and lovingly repaired. Lowers occurrences of serious injury.
Bandana embroidered with the word "Infinity." Enables the wearer to carry limitless ammunition. *Restricts mission completion rank to an A or below, and cannot be used during FOB Missions.
Face mask made of non-flammable material that protects the wearer's face from both flames and shrapnel. Also serves as a means to escape detection.
Headgear made of urethane wrapped in an aramid weave. Protects the head from impacts incurred during combat.
Headgear that places a special lightweight alloy around the wearer's head for improved survivability. Ideal for defending against sniper attacks.
Added function for Fulton recovery device. Enables extraction of children.
Added function for Fulton recovery device. Uses a wormhole to transport all manner of cargo off the battlefield, from soldiers, children, and animals to vehicles and containers.
Infrared sensor. Intruder detection system that uses the infrared beam interruption method. Detects any individual who touches the beam, and sounds an alarm.

Antitheft device. Alarm device that uses a tilt sensor. Remembers the positional angles of protected object, and sounds an alarm when object tilts beyond an allowable angle, such as due to Fulton extraction.
Antitheft device. Adds a field sensor. Detects any individual who approaches the device, and sounds an alarm.
Surveillance camera. Camera that monitors a fixed area in a cycle. Sounds an alarm if an intruder enters its visual field.

Gun camera. Surveillance camera with an added attack system that responds immediately to an intruder. If an intruder enters its visual field, it sounds an alarm and also engages the intruder with its 5.56mm machine gun.

General purpose unmanned security device. A drone that conducts aerial surveillance of a fixed area. Equipped with a 5.56mm machine gun. If an intruder enters its visual field, it sounds an alarm and also engages the intruder with its machine gun.

General purpose unmanned security device. Drone that has had its 5.56mm machine gun replaced with a grenade launcher that fires smoke rounds. Designed to limit an intruder's field of vision and actions.
General purpose unmanned security device. Drone equipped with a grenade launcher that fires sleeping gas rounds. Designed to neutralize an intruder non-lethally.
Added function for Fulton recovery device. Enables extraction of gun emplacements and mortars.
Universal extraction device that uses a wormhole to transport all manner of cargo off the battlefield, from people, children, and animals to vehicles and containers.

Variable-magnification binoculars for long-range recon and intel support. Equipped with a directional microphone feature, allowing the user to listen to distant noises and conversations. The added analyzer feature can determine soldiers' and prisoners' abilities and the exact skills they possess.

Variable-magnification binoculars for long-range recon and intel support. Equipped with a directional microphone feature, allowing the user to listen to distant noises and conversations. The added analyzer feature can determine soldiers' and prisoners' abilities and the category of any skills they possess.

Variable-magnification binoculars for long-range recon and intel support. Equipped with a directional microphone feature, allowing the user to listen to distant noises and conversations. The added analyzer feature can determine soldiers' and prisoners' abilities and whether they possess skills.
Gatling gun. A rotary cannon designed specifically for air-to-ground engagement. Powerful enough to put the fear of death in anyone caught in its sights.
General-purpose tactical helicopter. All engines have been fitted with afterburners for maximum thrust. The resulting optimal cruise speed enables unrivaled fast deployment.
General-purpose tactical helicopter. Two of its four gas turbine engines have been replaced with jet engines, for higher cruise speed and extremely fast deployment.
General-purpose tactical helicopter. The fuel system injects a special gas into the mixture for a major increase in thrust. The resulting improved cruise speed enables even faster deployment.
General-purpose tactical helicopter. Has had its quadruple engines expertly tuned for better cruise speed. Enables faster deployment.
Standard combat fatigues (animal). Wear on sandy surfaces or among greenery to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
A special silver Naked uniform awarded only to mission completion experts. Its magnificent radiance will leave rivals awestruck.
A special golden Naked uniform awarded only to ultimate mission completion masters. Its magnificent radiance will leave rivals awestruck.
Quiet custom combat gear. Exposes the maximum amount of skin, supposedly so as not to impede her transcutaneous respiration.
A special blood-soaked Naked uniform that Quiet wears only for those who fight by her side. The fake blood is designed to strike fear into enemies.
A special silver Naked uniform that Quiet wears only for those who have earned her trust. Its magnificent radiance will... leave enemies awestruck?
A special golden Naked uniform that Quiet wears only for those she feels a close bond with. Its magnificent radiance will... leave enemies awestruck?
Costume for Quiet. Now you can finally go into battle with Sniper Wolf... or the next best thing.
Standard gray combat fatigues worn by Cipher's covert strike force, XOF.

Silver-painted myoelectric prosthesis. Use the Call Button (<I=G=CALL>) + <I=G=CAMERA> to perform a "knock" (lure enemies). When equipped as a secondary weapon, press the CQC Button while sprinting to unleash a devastating punch.

Gold-painted myoelectric prosthesis. Use the Call Button (<I=G=CALL>) + <I=G=CAMERA> to perform a "knock" (lure enemies). When equipped as a secondary weapon, press the CQC Button while sprinting to unleash a devastating punch.
Added binoculars function: Enables analysis of enemies'/prisoners' abilities and whether or not they have skills.
Added binoculars function: Enables analysis of enemies'/prisoners' abilities and skill category.
Added binoculars function: Enables analysis of enemies'/prisoners' abilities and skills.
Added iDroid function: Enables playing of cassette tapes through speakers.
Added iDroid function: Increases max. number of markers.
Device that uses a balloon to extract personnel from the battlefield. Can be used to extract small cargo such as machine gun emplacements/mortars in addition to personnel and animals.

Device that uses a balloon to extract personnel from the battlefield. Can be used to extract large cargo such as vehicles/anti-aircraft cannons/containers, and small cargo such as machine gun emplacements/mortars, in addition to personnel and animals.

Device that uses a balloon to extract personnel from the battlefield. Can be used to extract large cargo such as vehicles/anti-aircraft cannons/containers, and small cargo such as machine gun emplacements/mortars, in addition to personnel, animals, and even small children.
Standard-issue combat fatigues worn by Naked Snake during Operation Snake Eater. Wear on sandy surfaces or among greenery to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.

Soviet Sneaking Suit worn by Naked Snake during Operation Snake Eater. In addition to the noise-dampening soles that eliminate the sound of footsteps, this suit features a high-strength aramid weave that offers superb damage resistance. *In FOB missions, this uniform prevents your body heat being detected by NVG-equipped enemies.
Tuxedo that Naked Snake is said to have worn during Operation Snake Eater. For the gentleman who knows how to dress for the occasion.

White Sneaking Suit that The Boss wore during Operation Snake Eater. In addition to the noise-dampening soles that eliminate the sound of footsteps, this suit features a high-strength aramid weave that offers superb damage resistance. *For female staff only. *In FOB missions, this uniform prevents your body heat being detected by NVG-equipped enemies.
Jumpsuit that the female spy EVA wore during Operation Snake Eater. The chest area can be unzipped for a tactical advantage. *For female staff only
Non-tactical loadout for D-Horse. Perfect for imaginary travels through the Old West.
Non-tactical loadout for D-Horse. Special tack for ceremonies, parades, and other formal occasions, real or imagined.

Highly sensitive night-vision gear that augments sight for better situational awareness in low light. Customized for use by DD soldiers, it also reveals the presence of enemies concealed by smoke. *[SNEAKING SUIT Grade: 4] must be developed first in order to develop this item.

Highly sensitive night-vision gear that augments sight for better situational awareness in low light. Customized for use by DD soldiers, it also reveals the presence of enemies concealed by smoke. *[BATTLE DRESS Grade: 5] must be developed first in order to develop this item.
Standard combat fatigues (woodland fleck). Wear among greenery to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (solum). Wear in rivers or swamps to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (lichen). Wear among greenery to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (stone). Wear on rocky surfaces to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (parasite mist). Wear on metal or concrete surfaces to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (old rose). Wear on metal or concrete surfaces to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (brick red). Wear on metal or concrete surfaces to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (steel grey). Wear on metal or concrete surfaces to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (ambush). Wear among greenery to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.

Standard combat fatigues (tselinoyarsk). Wear on metal or concrete surfaces to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.

Standard combat fatigues (digital bush). Wear in rivers or swamps to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (zebra). Wear on rocky surfaces to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (desert sand). Wear on metal or concrete surfaces to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (steel khaki). Wear on metal or concrete surfaces to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (dark rubber). Wear on metal or concrete surfaces to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (gray). Wear on metal or concrete surfaces to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (camouflage yellow). Wear on metal or concrete surfaces to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (camouflage green). Wear on metal or concrete surfaces to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (iron green). Wear on metal or concrete surfaces to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (light rubber). Wear on metal or concrete surfaces to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (red rust). Wear on metal or concrete surfaces to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (steel green). Wear on metal or concrete surfaces to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (steel orange). Wear on metal or concrete surfaces to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (mud). Wear on metal or concrete surfaces to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (steel blue). Wear on metal or concrete surfaces to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (dark rust). Wear on metal or concrete surfaces to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (citrullus two-tone). Wear among greenery to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (gold tiger stripe two-tone). Wear among greenery to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (birch leaf two-tone). Wear among greenery to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (stone two-tone). Wear among greenery to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Standard combat fatigues (khaki urban two-tone). Wear among greenery to blend in, making it harder for the enemy to spot you.
Swimsuit (olive drab). Only equippable by DD soldiers. Does nothing to camouflage the wearer, but is light and airy enough to aid mobility.
Swimsuit (tiger stripe). Only equippable by DD soldiers. Does nothing to camouflage the wearer, but is light and airy enough to aid mobility.
Swimsuit (gold tiger). Only equippable by DD soldiers. Does nothing to camouflage the wearer, but is light and airy enough to aid mobility.
Swimsuit (desert fox). Only equippable by DD soldiers. Does nothing to camouflage the wearer, but is light and airy enough to aid mobility.
Swimsuit (wet work). Only equippable by DD soldiers. Does nothing to camouflage the wearer, but is light and airy enough to aid mobility.
Swimsuit (splitter). Only equippable by DD soldiers. Does nothing to camouflage the wearer, but is light and airy enough to aid mobility.
Swimsuit (parasite mist). Only equippable by DD soldiers. Does nothing to camouflage the wearer, but is light and airy enough to aid mobility.
Swimsuit (old rose). Only equippable by DD soldiers. Does nothing to camouflage the wearer, but is light and airy enough to aid mobility.

Swimsuit (red rust). Only equippable by DD soldiers. Does nothing to camouflage the wearer, but is light and airy enough to aid mobility.
Swimsuit (mud). Only equippable by DD soldiers. Does nothing to camouflage the wearer, but is light and airy enough to aid mobility.
